Entries.Mon4: I've learned a lot from Birdie and my bird family...#$b#But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.$s
Entries.Tue: When the Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.#$e#The Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...$h
Entries.Thu: Have you met the loud people in the boats?#$b#I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with Birdie and the parrots.
Entries.Fri: One time, I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away!
Entries.Fri4: I wonder if I can see your home from the top of the volcano?$h
Entries.Sun2: I like golden walnuts, but I like the mangoes best. Birdie likes them too!

Entries.4: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Linus told me it was a hot-air balloon!$u#$b#I thought only birds could fly...
Entries.18: When I first arrived, Linus made me a suit out of leaves, like his...#$b#But I looked funny... like a fuzzy mango!$h#$e#I think I'll stick to my feathers.
Entries.LeoDeparture: I need to find some place to live...$s#$b#But I have a plan... I'm going to rely on my friends.
Entries.Thu8: It felt bad at first... to leave the island and set foot in a strange land.$s#$e#But, I got used to it after a while.#$b#I'm a very flexible person!$h
Entries.Thu10: I felt like a stranger here, at first. But I've made a lot of friends!$h
Entries.Tue10: I'm sure the other children thought I was weird, at first. I accidentally squawked at the school table a few times... that didn't help.$s#$e#It was a big change for everyone. But we're good friends now!$h
Entries.Fri: Linus has been teaching me about all the wild food in the valley. There's a lot of good stuff out here!$h#$e#Some of it is almost as good as golden walnuts!
Entries.Fri8: Uncle Linus say that some fish should be cooked before you eat them.#$b#I'm having a hard time getting used to it... so dry...$s
Entries.Sun10: The parrots say thank you for all the golden walnuts you've found. They couldn't get to them without your help.$h
Entries.Sat10: I think I'd like to visit Zuzu City soon. Linus says there are lots of birds called pigeons there.#$b#Don't worry, I'll only go if you or Miss Penny come with me. I don't want to get lost!

Entries.LeoCooking: @,^Here's a food I help Birdie make, that me and my bird family enjoy. Hope you like it. ^^  -Leo^^P.S. Willy helped me write this.%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Leo's Recipe

Bird friend?$u"/pause 1000/animate ParrotBoy false true 500 19/pause 200/positionOffset ParrotBoy 16 0/playSound slimeHit/startJittering/pause 200/positionOffset ParrotBoy -16 0/stopJittering/pause 600/positionOffset ParrotBoy 16 0/playSound slimeHit/startJittering/pause 200/positionOffset ParrotBoy -16 0/stopJittering/pause 600/stopAnimation ParrotBoy/pause 1500/speak ParrotBoy "...Hmm. You seem okay."/jump ParrotBoy/pause 1500/specificTemporarySprite parrotHutSquawk/pause 10/pause 2100/animate ParrotBoy false true 500 17/playSound parrot_squawk/shake ParrotBoy 800/pause 1600/stopAnimation ParrotBoy/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak ParrotBoy "...She asked if you are bird friend.#$b#I told her... yes.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 300/quickQuestion #How did you end up here?#Where are your parents?(break)pause 100(break)pause 100/playMusic echos/pause 500/faceDirection ParrotBoy 2/emote ParrotBoy 28/showFrame ParrotBoy 18/pause 400/speak ParrotBoy "...Big Storm... Waves... Lightning...$s"/pause 500/pause 500/speak ParrotBoy "...No, no, no... that was just a bad dream.$s"/showFrame ParrotBoy 0/pause 1000/stopAnimation ParrotBoy/faceDirection ParrotBoy 1/playMusic jungle_ambience/speak ParrotBoy "...No... I don't remember. I live here with my bird family."/pause 800/quickQuestion #If you're a bird, how can you speak?#Are there any grown-ups who look after you?(break)showFrame ParrotBoy 16\jump ParrotBoy\pause 1700\showFrame ParrotBoy 0\pause 500\addTemporaryActor Toddler 13 10 7 4 2 true Parrot\hideShadow Toddler true\specificTemporarySprite parrotHutSquawk\faceDirection farmer 0 true\faceDirection ParrotBoy 0 true\textAboveHead Toddler "*Awk*"\pause 1000\textAboveHead Toddler "If you're a bird"\pause 1500\specificTemporarySprite parrotHutSquawk\textAboveHead Toddler "*Awk*"\pause 1000\textAboveHead Toddler "How can you speak?"\pause 1700\animate ParrotBoy false true 150 17 22\jump ParrotBoy\pause 400\speak ParrotBoy "Haha! See? We speak! We speak!$h"(break)pause 400\speak ParrotBoy "Grown-ups?#$b#Most of my bird friends are grown up. There are a few babies who can't fly, like me!$h#$b#Do you mean grown-ups who are like you? There's a nice lady who gives me food. She's very grown-up.#$b#She says her name is Birdie, but she's not a bird... it's confusing.$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/move farmer 0 2 2/stopAnimation ParrotBoy/faceDirection ParrotBoy 2 true/textAboveHead ParrotBoy "Hey."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/speak ParrotBoy "...I remembered something.$s"/emote farmer 8/speak ParrotBoy "My name...$s"/changeName ParrotBoy Leo/speak ParrotBoy "...It's Leo."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/end warpOut 2

Entries.6497423/e 1039573/f Leo 500/w sunny/t 60: sad_kid/79 89/farmer 79 89 2 Leo 80 81 2 Willy 89 87 3/skippable/move Leo 0 8 2/pause 200/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 600/faceDirection Leo 2/pause 1000/speak Leo "What are you doing, @?"/pause 800/quickQuestion #Just enjoying the waves#Looking for fish#Thinking about someone special#Pondering the big questions(break)pause 500\showFrame Leo 18\emote Leo 28\speak Leo "Waves...$s#$b#My bird friends say the reason I can't fly... is because I spent too much time in the waves, long ago.$s#$b#My wings are full of water, now.$s"\emote farmer 8(break)pause 500\speak Leo "Fish? Easy... $h#$b#If you want to say 'hi', you just have to ask."\pause 500\animate Leo false true 500 17\playSound parrot_squawk\shake Leo 800\pause 800\stopAnimation Leo\pause 1200\playSound pullItemFromWater\specificTemporarySprite islandFishSplash\animate farmer false true 100 94\jump farmer\pause 500\animate Leo false true 150 17 22\pause 2000\stopAnimation farmer\pause 1200\stopAnimation Leo(break)pause 500\faceDirection Leo 3\emote Leo 8\faceDirection Leo 2\speak Leo "Oh. I don't understand that, yet.$s#$b#Maybe I will when I'm old too."(break)pause 500\speak Leo "Oh.. Yeah. I like to ponder the big questions, too."\faceDirection Leo 3\speak Leo "Like... 'will I find more walnuts on the beach, or in the volcano?'"\faceDirection Leo 2\showFrame Leo 18\emote Leo 28\speak Leo"*sigh*...Life is complicated...$s"/showFrame Leo 0/pause 1000/emote Leo 40/speak Leo "@?$s"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Leo "Tell me about the place you come from... your home.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/quickQuestion #There's a town full of people#There's forests, beaches, and mountains#It's like here, but colder#I live on a farm(break)emote Leo 40\speak Leo "People...$s"(break)pause 400\speak Leo "Sounds nice."(break)emote Leo 8\speak Leo "Cold? ...I don't understand...$s"(break)emote Leo 8\speak Leo "Farm? So, you're saying you grow your own food? You don't have to search for it?$3#$b#...Wow..$3"\pause 500\speak Leo "I'm thinking... @ is smart.$h"/pause 1500/showFrame Leo 18/playMusic ocean/pause 700/pause 1400/speak Leo "Are... Are there... other kids?$s"/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/quickQuestion #Yes#What does that matter to a bird?(break)pause 100(break)pause 100/showFrame Leo 0/pause 1000/emote Leo 28/pause 600/faceDirection Leo 0/speak Leo "...I know I'm not actually a bird, @...$s#$b#I'm like you.$s#$b#But I don't like thinking about it...$s#$b# ...because I'm so alone.$s"/faceDirection Leo 3/speak Leo "With my bird family, I feel like I belong.$s"/pause 400/faceDirection Leo 2/showFrame Leo 18/pause 400/emote Leo 28/speak Leo "But... I don't belong.$s#$b#...I don't belong anywhere...$s"/speed Leo 4/faceDirection farmer 0 true/shake Leo 1000/move Leo 0 -9 0/move Willy -8 0 0/emote Willy 28/speak Willy "Poor lad...$s"/pause 500/speak Willy "I wonder if there's some way to help...$s"/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisible Leo

Entries.6497421/e 6497423/f Leo 1000/w sunny/t 6: /19 14/farmer 18 19 0 Leo 19 13 0/playMusic tropical_island_day_ambient/skippable/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 1500/playSound parrot/shake Leo 500/pause 250/playSound batScreech/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/animate farmer false false 1000 94/jump farmer 8/pause 250/faceDirection Leo 2 true/animate Leo false false 1000 16/shake Leo 500/jump Leo 8/pause 250/stopJittering/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 3000/speak Leo "Sorry...$u"/speak Leo "I didn't mean to scare you.$s"/pause 500/emote Leo 40/pause 1000/speak Leo "You think I'm weird, don't you?$s"/quickQuestion #Not at all#A little, but I'm used to it#(Squawk loudly)(break)pause 250\speak Leo "Thanks for saying that."(break)pause 250\speak Leo "Thanks, I've gotten used to you too!$h"(break)pause 250\startJittering\playSound parrot\pause 250\stopJittering\pause 250\speak Leo "Hehe... You're getting pretty good at that!$h"/viewport move 0 -1 4000/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 0 true/pause 1000/playMusic sad_kid/pause 4000/speak Leo "Sometimes I wonder how different my life would be if I had never washed up on this island...$s"/pause 3000/speak Leo "Back home, I didn't really care about birds. I never thought to listen to what they might be saying.$s"/pause 1000/emote Leo 40/pause 2000/speak Leo "Though I guess that's normal for... normal kids.$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 1000/speak Leo "I wonder what... normal kids would have to say about me...$s"/pause 1000/emote Leo 40/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 2 true/pause 500/speak Leo "Do you think I could ever be a normal kid again?$s"/question null "#Yes#No#There's no such thing as 'normal'."/pause 1000/speak Leo "Hmmm... I guess you're right.$u"/speak Leo "Though living on this island has given me a lot of experiences most kids would never have.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 0 true/pause 500/speak Leo "If it weren't for the parrots, and Birdie... who knows what would have happened to me."/pause 500/emote Leo 32/pause 500/speak Leo "I'm happy I met them. I'll always consider them to be my family, even if that makes me a little strange.$h"/pause 500/viewport move 0 1 4000/pause 100/faceDirection Leo 2 true/move Leo 0 1 2/pause 250/faceDirection Leo 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 3000/speak Leo "Anyways, thanks for talking to me, @."/pause 500/speak Leo "Maybe some day, you can be a part of our family too!.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 2 true/pause 1000/speak Leo "Here, let me teach you how to say "Let's play" in parrot talk!"/pause 500/viewport move 0 1 99999/pause 500/playSound parrot/animate Leo false false 1000 17/shake Leo 1000/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/playSound parrot/pause 250/stopJittering/globalFade/viewport -5000 -5000/end

Entries.6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6: tropical_island_day_ambient/21 38/farmer 20 31 2 Leo 21 31 2 Willy -100 -100 1 Linus -100 -100 1 Birdie -100 -100 1/addConversationTopic LeoDeparture 0/skippable/move farmer 0 5 1 true/move Leo 0 5 3 true/proceedPosition Leo/warp Willy 16 43/move Willy 1 0 1 false/warp Linus 21 25/warp Birdie 22 25/faceDirection Linus 2/faceDirection Birdie 2/move Linus 0 8 2 true/move Birdie 0 8 2 true/move Willy 5 0 0 false/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Leo 0/emote Leo 8/speed Leo 4/move Leo 0 3 2/showFrame Leo 16/jump Leo/faceDirection Leo 1/faceDirection Leo 3/faceDirection Leo 0/shake Leo 1000/emote Linus 28/pause 700/speak Birdie "It's alright, Leo. This is Linus. He's friendly."/pause 700/emote Leo 40/pause 700/speak Linus "Hello, Leo. I've heard all about you, and your parrot family.#$b#It's really something special!$h"/move Willy 0 -5 0/speak Willy "Aye, lad... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of us.#$b#After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So I brought him here to hatch a little plan.$h"/pause 1000/playMusic sad_kid/speak Birdie "We've had a chat, and... well... I think you should go with Linus to the mainland.$s#$b#There are other children there. You should be around them, learning and playing and getting into trouble, hehe!$h"/speak Linus "Stardew Valley is a beautiful place... not as warm as here, but still full of life... and I live right in the middle of it!#$b#I know the lay of the land, and many things about the waters, the trees, the animals, and more...#$b#You see... I'm a child of nature, too. You might say we're 'birds of a feather'.$h#$b#I'd like to teach someone all that I've learned, and I think you're that someone."/emote Leo 16/speak Leo "L... leave the island?$u"/pause 600/speak Willy "Don't worry. I can take you back for a visit any time!$h"/pause 500/speak Willy "What do you think, @?"/pause 400/quickQuestion #I think it's a great idea.#I think he should stay here.#It's up to Leo...(break)pause 400\emote Willy 32\speak Linus "Well, let's not forget, the choice is really up to Leo..."\pause 500(break)pause 100\emote Willy 28\speak Linus "I understand. This is Leo's home, after all.$s"\speak Linus "It's hard to make changes. But sometimes It's for the best.#$b#Still, the choice is really up to Leo."(break)faceDirection farmer 1\pause 400/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 400/faceDirection Leo 0/emote Leo 40/speak Leo "I... $u#$b#I'll go."/emote Willy 32 true/pause 400/textAboveHead Linus "Great!"/pause 2000/emote Leo 28/pause 500/speak Leo "But... my family...$s"/playMusic ocean/pause 2000/playSound parrot_squawk/pause 600/emote Leo 8/pause 700/playSound parrot_squawk/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrot/pause 2000/faceDirection Leo 3/jump Leo/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Linus 3 true/faceDirection Willy 3/pause 1000/speed Leo 4/move Leo 0 1 3/move Leo -1 0 3/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawk/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawkStop/pause 600/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawk/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawkStop/pause 1000/emote Leo 20/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 2/speak Birdie "The parrots are all happy for you, boy.#$b#They want you to start the next chapter of your life, wherever it may lead..."/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 3/speak Birdie "No matter what happens... they'll always be your family... and so will I."/playMusic CloudCountry/pause 400/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawk/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotSquawkStop/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite BoatParrotLeave/pause 500/speed Leo 4/move Leo 2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Linus 1 true/faceDirection Willy 0 true/textAboveHead Leo "Goodbye!"/pause 5400/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Leo 2/emote Leo 40/pause 500/jump Leo/pause 500/speak Leo "I'm ready!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 32 true/emote Willy 32 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 3/pause 400/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1300/message "A new arrival to the valley..."/pause 1200/message "It seems our little town is growing!"/pause 1000/end Leo

Entries.8959199/w sunny/t 600 1900/e 6497428/f L: sad_kid/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Linus 30 9 3 Leo 28 9 1 Penny -100 -100 2 Jas -100 -100 3 Vincent -100 -100 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite LeoLinusCooking/animate Linus true true 500 20 21/viewport 26 9 clamp true/viewport move 1 0 10000/pause 1000/textAboveHead Leo "It's ready!"/pause 4000/textAboveHead Linus "Not yet..."/pause 1500/emote Leo 28 true/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation ArchaeologyHouse/warp Penny 18 9/warp Linus -100 -100/showFrame Penny 18/warp Jas 19 10/showFrame Jas 22/warp Vincent 16 10/showFrame Vincent 24/warp Leo 18 12/showFrame Leo 24/pause 500/viewport 13 10 clamp true/viewport move 1 0 8000/pause 2000/textAboveHead Penny "Good answer, Leo!"/pause 1000/emote Leo 20 true/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Penny -100 -100/warp Jas -100 -100/warp Jas -100 -100/changeLocation Beach/warp Leo 42 36/showFrame Leo 0/addTemporaryActor Willy 16 64 43 38 2/animate Willy false true 500 8 9 10 11/viewport 36 36 clamp true/viewport move 1 0 8000/pause 1000/emote Leo 40/pause 2000/shake Willy 3000/showFrame Leo 16/jump Leo/playSound waterSlosh/animate Willy false true 200 17 18/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite LeoWillyFishing/playSound dropItemInWater/textAboveHead Willy "Got one, lad!"/pause 500/playSound waterSlosh/pause 500/playSound waterSlosh/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Vincent -100 -100/warp Willy -100 -100/pause 600/changeLocation LeoTreeHouse/pause 500/viewport 3 3 true/pause 4000/stopAnimation Leo/faceDirection Leo 0/warp Leo 3 8/playSound doorClose/move Leo 0 -3 0/move Leo -1 0 3/doAction 1 5/pause 500/speak Leo "Haha! ...That was a great day!$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 2/pause 1000/showFrame Leo 18/pause 1000/speak Leo "You know... I still miss my family back on the island...$s"/pause 400/showFrame Leo 0/speak Leo "But mostly, I feel happy about the memories, not sad."/pause 400/faceDirection Leo 3/speak Leo "...and I really feel like I belong here!$h"/pause 500/doAction 1 5/pause 500/doAction 1 5/pause 1000/move Leo 0 -3 0/pause 2000/speak Leo "It's a beautiful world, friends..."/pause 600/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 140/faceDirection Leo 2/pause 800/speak Leo "...and I'm glad to be part of it!$h"/pause 1000/doAction 1 5/pause 1000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 1500/end
